code: import axios from"axios";const API=axios.create({baseURL:"https://reqres.in/api"});export const login=data=>API.post("/login",data);export const getUsers=page=>API.get(`/users?page=${page}`);export const updateUser=(id,data)=>API.put(`/users/${id}`,data);export const deleteUser=id=>API.delete(`/users/${id}`);
